constituent: sad, un-, jail cell, prison bars, heart
koohiiStory1: Saddness is like having your heart captured and jailed because of some sad or terrible event, etc. Here the sad heart waits for someone to come and un-lock their jail cell and set them free again.
koohiiStory2: Stuck in a jail cell with his heart crying out to see his family again, the prisoner has never felt so sad.
readingExamples: 悲しい (かな.しい), 悲しむ (かな.しむ)
words:
悲観(ひかん): pessimism, disappointment
悲惨(ひさん): misery
悲鳴(ひめい): shriek, scream
悲しむ(かなしむ): be sad, mourn for, regret
悲劇(ひげき): tragedy
悲しい(かなしい): sad
